name: lecasei
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpjaodan(w0, w1, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0)), w1)
-| wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0)), w1)
-| wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0)), w1)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0)), w1)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: Ordering elimination by cases. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2007.)
